post.title: Welcome to Nibbleblog
post.content:
Congratulations, you have your blog installed and working.

To modify any settings you should go into administrator's control panel http://localhost/nibbleblog/admin.php

If you need any help you can enter the support forum http://forum.nibbleblog.com

Visit Nibbleblog on Facebook and if you like click on LIKE https://www.facebook.com/nibbleblog
